DefaultEvent.Description:
The smithy is a long low building that you missed on your first survey of the island. The smith is a quiet man with a pinched face, who works entirely in heartmetal.

The Cannoneer greets him with a yell of delight. The smith winces, puts down his hammer, pinches the bridge of his nose. "It's you," he says. "Two of you."
DefaultEvent.Name: Easy to overlook

ChildBranches.Name: Ask directions
ChildBranches.Description: A Clay Man directs you, with a minimum of enthusiasm and even fewer words.

Description: "I don't know where he is!! Can we ask directions?"
Name: Meeting the Heartmetal Smith
